errors.60: The consumer is not enrolled for 3D Secure authentications.
errors.70: The status of the payment is in doubt at the bank.
errors.140: The payment was not completed within the given set time limit by the consumer and is expired.
errors.160: The transaction had been rejected for reasons of suspected fraud.
errors.170: The authorisation is expired because no explicit settlement request was received in time.
errors.180: The cardholder authentication response from the bank was invalid or not completed.
errors.310: The consumer is not enrolled for 3D Secure authentications. Authorization not possible.
errors.320: The authentication service was out of order, cardholder could not be authenticated. Authorization not possible.
errors.330: The cardholder is not participating in the 3D Secure authentication program. Authorization not possible.
errors.99999: Payment/Refund/Payout attempt was cancelled by the merchant.
errors.not_supported: Credit card type is not supported.
errors.try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.

your card will not be charged: Your card will not be charged - No payments will be charged to your account until your booking has been confirmed by our operators.
if we do not recognise the email: If we do not recognise the email address you have provided in the checkout process, we will automatically create a new TheAsia.com account for you once the payment process is complete. Your account will enable you to manage your booking once the booking process is finished.
